template&lt; class CharT, class Traits &gt;
void swap( std::basic_spanbuf&lt;CharT, Traits&gt;&amp; lhs,
           std::basic_spanbuf&lt;CharT, Traits&gt;&amp; rhs );
}}

Overloads the {{lc|std::swap}} algorithm for {{lc|std::basic_spanbuf}}. Exchanges the state of {{c|lhs}} with that of {{c|rhs}}. Equivalent to {{c|lhs.swap(rhs);}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|lhs, rhs|{{lc|std::basic_spanbuf}} objects whose states to swap}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
(none)
